definitions.title: n.[f]pl. denom
definitions.body: place at the head, head-place;—only sf. [[מְרַאֲשׁׂתָיו]] as adv. at his head-place (of one lying down) Ge 28:11, Ge 28:18 (E), 1Sa 19:13, 1Sa 19:16, 1Ki 19:6; so Qr 1Sa 26:7, 1Sa 26:11, 1Sa 26:16; (Kt [[מראשׁתו]]); in v:1Sa 26:12 read [[מִמְּרַאֲשׁׂתָיו]] LXX. We Dr HPS, for MT [[מֵרַאֲשׁׂתֵי שָׁאוּל]], [[מַרְאֲשׁוֹתֵיכֶם]] Je 13:18 (head-tires AV:m RV),  rd. [[מַרְאשֵׁיכֶם]], Je 13:8 (head-tiresAV:m RV), rd. [[מֵרָאשֵׁיכֶם]] from your heads, LXX. SyrVer Targum Gie Buhl Co:Hpt (cf., already, Thes).
